City Council
============

#### Miguel Chacon

Mayor

mayorchacon@cityofsanelizario.com

#### Hector Raul Ramos

Alderperson Place 1

h.ramos@cityofsanelizario.com

#### Marcos Antonio Grijalva

Alderperson Place 2

m.grijalva@cityofsanelizario.com

![Lorenzo E. Leyva Sr.](https://cityofsanelizario.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/lorenzo-leyva.jpg)

#### Lorenzo E. Leyva Sr.

Alderperson Place 3

alderperson3@cityofsanelizario.com

![Armando Alarcon](https://cityofsanelizario.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/photo-coming-soon.jpg)

#### Armando Alarcon

Alderperson Place 4

#### Thomas Black

Alderperson Place 5

tblackplace5@cityofsanelizario.com

San Elizario City Hall
======================

12710 Church St. • P.O. Box 1723 • San Elizario, Texas, 79849  
[915.974.7037 •](tel:9159747037) [info@cityofsanelizario.com](mailto:info@cityofsanelizario.com)  
Monday – Thursday 7:00 am – 5:30 pm

Municipal Court
===============

12004 Socorro Rd., Suite B  
P.O. Box 1458  
San Elizario, Texas, 79849  
[915.302.2050](tel:9153022050)

Monday – Thursday  
7:00 am – 5:30 pm
